name: CommandRouter
description: Simple router for prefix-based text commands (e.g., `!help`). Register handlers by command name; receives typed message/context objects.

important_methods.name: register(command:handler)
important_methods.description: Register a handler for a command string.

important_methods.name: handle(message)
important_methods.description: Dispatch an incoming message to the appropriate handler based on prefix parsing.

notes: Provides argument parsing and simple rate-limit/cooldown integration via `CooldownManager`.
